sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMS(cms_no ,cms_nm ,cms_yn) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(cms_no),#code_gubun#||'00')+1 from cms where cms_no like #code_gubun#||'%' ) ,#cms_nm# ,#cms_yn#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT cms_no , cms_nm , decode(CMS_YN,'Y','사용','미사용') cms_yn FROM CMS ORDER BY cms_no DESC
SELECT CMS_NO,CMS_NM,CMS_YN FROM CMS WHERE CMS_NO=#cms_no#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CMS SET CMS_NM=#cms_nm#, CMS_YN=#cms_yn# WHERE CMS_NO=#cms_no#
